title: Favorite DJ Sona soundtrack?
body:
I swear that poll hasn't been made yet, or did someone made it already?

Should've asked this a LONG time ago, but better than never, right?

replies.body: Concussive is my favorite. But I try to stick to Ethereal for early game, Kinetic for mid game, and Concussive for late game. It just makes sense to me.

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=psAfgmNA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-23T06:22:21.744+0000)
>
> Concussive is my favorite. But I try to stick to Ethereal for early game, Kinetic for mid game, and Concussive for late game. It just makes sense to me.

I do this exact same thing.  Once I swap to Concussive, you know it's serious business.
Well you can hope at least. Considering that many Late game champions never get their chances to shine with some of these ridiculously short games. Though longer games still happen... Sometimes. =/
Well if you look at my summoner Icon....Kinetic.
